comment: specific for methanol corrinoid protein [KO:K14081] (ec 2.1.1.246, following after R04384) specific for (mono/di/tri)methylamine corrinoid protein [KO:K16177 K16179 K14084] (ec 2.1.1.247, following after R10014, R10015 or R10016) specific for tetramethylammonium corrinoid protein (ec 2.1.1.253, following after R10017) specific for methylated-thiol corrinoid protein (ec 2.1.1.251, following after R10001)
definition: Coenzyme M + Methyl-Co(III) corrinoid protein <=> 2-(Methylthio)ethanesulfonate + Co(I) corrinoid protein
name: [methyl-Co(III) corrinoid protein]:coenzyme M methyltransferase
